title: Enhancing 3D SEM Imaging with AI: Generating Training Data through Laser Machining and Confocal Analysis
content: The ability to accurately capture the 3D surface profile of materials with high resolution is essential across numerous applications. High-resolution images provided by Scanning Electron Microscopy (SEM) are invaluable for examining surface details at the micro to nanoscale. However, when analyzing 3D structures, conventional SEM images fall short as they cannot adequately capture the third dimension. This limitation is particularly critical in applications where the 3D topology of a surface plays a pivotal role, such as in the analysis of laser-restructured electrodes in energy devices, where surface morphology directly impacts performance.
